parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The app responsible for generating the notification. Some of the core Facebook features have their own app that shows up here, such as likes when someone likes another person's content.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The entity (user, page, app, etc.) that 'sent', or is the source of the notification.

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: The URL that clicking on the notification would take someone.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: The object (this can be a post, a photo, a comment, etc.) that was the subject of the notification.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The message text in the notification.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The entity that received the notification.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: Indicates that the notification is unread. Note that 'read' notifications will not be accessible.

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: When the notification was last updated.
